Visible.description: Set the visibility of the button.

OnPress.description: Action or rule to be performed when the event is triggered.

Title.description: Label to be displayed on the button. For Android, the text is always in upper case and cannot be styled to contain lower case letters.

Style.description: It supports font-color, normal background-color and highlighted background-color for the button.

_Name.description:
If _Name is not provided, the _Type + current row index + primary/secondary will be used as the name of the action item. 

If _Name is provided and belongs to a static ObjectCard, it will be used as the name of the action item. 

If _Name is provided and belongs to a dynamic ObjectCard, the name + current row index + primary/secondary will be used as the name of the action item.
